articles.title: Secretary Choe Thae Bok meets Chinese delegation
articles.content:
Remains of U.S. serviceman repatriated
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Remains of an American soldier, which had been found during the third joint search for remains of U.S. servicemen in Jonsungri, Unsan county, North Phyongan Province from Oct. 4, was transferred to the U.S. side through Panmunjom on Friday.

articles.title: Film show to commemorate National Day of Kazakhstan
articles.content:
Secretary Choe Thae Bok meets Chinese delegation
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, alternate politburo member and Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, met and conversed with a delegation of China's Beijing Daily led by President Man Yunlai at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday. 
   Present there were editor-in-chief of Pyongyang Sinmun Cha Kyong Chuk and Chinese Ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang.
   On the occasion the head of the delegation extended warm congratulations to General Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, on his election as WPK General Secretary.
   He said that the Sino-Korean friendship had been fostered by President Kim Il Sung and comrades Mao Zedong and Zhou Enlai and that this friendship will be consolidated and developed down through generations.
   He hoped that the Korean people would surely achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: "Society for congratulating Kim Jong Il on his election as General Secretary" formed in Japan
articles.content:
Film show to commemorate National Day of Kazakhstan
   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A film show was held in Pyongyang on October 24 under the sponsorship of the Korea-Kazakhstan Friendship Association to commemorate the National Day of Kazakhstan.
   Present on the occasion together with working people in the city was leading officials of the association and personages concerned.
   The participants appreciated feature films "the Nation and Destiny" part 41.

articles.title: Congratulatory visits to Korean embassies
articles.content:
"Society for congratulating Kim Jong Il on his election as General Secretary" formed in Japan
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Executive Committee of the "Society for Congratulating Kim Jong Il on his Election as General Secretary" was formed in Japan as regards the election of General Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The Executive Committee, with Chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea Motofumi Makieta and Chief Director of the Japan-Korea Cultural Interchange Association Ryosho Hayashi as representative promoters, involves tens of prominent Japanese public figures.

articles.title: Dangerous military tie-up
articles.content:
Congratulatory visits to Korean embassies
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Minister of Public Service, Labor and Social Wellbeing and other vice-ministers of Zimbabwe, the directors of the Information Department and the Political and Cultural Department of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front, a deputy Secretary General of the General Union of Arab peasants and cooperatives, a legal advisor to the General Union of Farmers and Breeders of Libya, the Chairman of the Peace Movement of Senegal, the Chairman of the Guyana-Korea Friendship Association and a delegation of the Ministry of Religion of Guyana led by its Secretary of state recently paid calls at Korean embassies in their countries to congratulate General Kim Jong Il on his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   And leading officials of the Malagasy Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, the Malagasy National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Society for the Study of the Juche Idea of the University of Madagascar, the Malagasy Society for the Study of the Juche-Based Idea on Literature and Art, the Federation of Trade Unions of the Malagasy Revolutionary Workers and the Malagasy Trade Unions' Front paid congratulatory visits to the Korean Embassy in their country.
   They said that the election of General Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the WPK is a significant event, which will shine bright in the history of the struggle of the working class and the people.
   The immortal Juche idea and the revolutionary cause of Juche are being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is identical to President Kim Il Sung in ideology, leadership and virtues, they said, adding this is a great joy and pride not only of the Korean people but also of the followers of the Juche idea all over the world.

articles.title: General Secretary Kim Jong Il awarded order of organization of socialists in Mediterranean
articles.content:
Dangerous military tie-up
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today runs a commentary disclosing the real intention of the United States and Japan which are scheming to stage various joint military exercises in November under the new "Japan-U.S.defense cooperation guidelines".
   The news analyst says:
   Through the "guidelines", the U.S. seeks to tighten the subordinate military tie-up with Japan, legitimatize Japan's military support to it and get the "self-defense forces" involved in its aggressive war. And with the new "guidelines" Japan is trying to secure legitimate conditions for joint military action with the United States outside its territory and rushing headlong toward the road of military overseas aggression.
   The U.S.-Japan joint military drills are aimed at perfecting the system of joint operation to stage joint operations in any place of Asia anytime.
   Their spearhead is directed to the Korean Peninsula.
   It is because the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries have given priority to controlling the DPRK to carry out their military strategy toward Asia.
   The planned U.S.-Japan joint military exercises are a premeditated step for bringing into practice the joint operation scheme, which is intended to make a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
   They are seeking military aggression on the DPRK and the rest of Asia with the new "guidelines", which will aggravate the tense situation in this region and pose a grave threat to peace and security.    
     The United States and Japan are by no means "defenders of regional security", the commentary stresses.

articles.title: Book praising General Secretary Kim Jong Il published in Yugoslavia
articles.content:
General Secretary Kim Jong Il awarded order of organization of socialists in Mediterranean
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was awarded the first class of the order, supreme order, of the organization of socialists in the Mediterranean on his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
   A member of the permanent secretariat of the organization who is executive director made an address for conveying the order in the name of the organization at a meeting in Tarabulus on Oct. 18.
   He said that the permanent secretariat of the organization was glad to extend the warmest congratulations to General Kim Jong Il, who was elected General Secretary of the WPK by the unanimous desire of the Korean people, in the name of the political parties, organizations and forces of all Mediterranean countries affiliated with the organisation.
   The organization in the future, too, will give invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to realize national reunification and peace and security in the Korean peninsula, frustrating challenges of the outside forces, he added.   The first class of the order of the organization to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was handed to the Korean Ambassador to Libya at the meeting.

articles.title: Extraordinary plenary meeting of C.C., Communist Party of Malta
articles.content:
Book praising General Secretary Kim Jong Il published in Yugoslavia
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A book "To Marshal Kim Jong Il" was published in Yugoslavia on October 17 to congratulate General Kim Jong Il on his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The book edits articles praising the greatness and leadership feats of General Kim Jong Il which were written by Durica Rabovic, Secretary General of the Yugoslavia-Korea Friendship Association.
   It carries the main content of Kim Jong Il's work "On Establishing the Juche Outlook on the Revolution" and his brief biography.
   It also introduces the feats performed by him in all domains of the Party, State, army and external policy under the titles "Iron-Willed Brilliant Commander", "To Marshal Kim Jong Il" and so on.

articles.title: Representative of UNDP gives party
articles.content:
Extraordinary plenary meeting of C.C., Communist Party of Malta
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- An extraordinary plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Malta took place on Oct. 14 to congratulate General Kim Jong Il  on his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   General Secretary of the C.C., the CPM Anthony Vassalo made a report at the meeting.
   He extended warm congratulations to General Kim Jong Il on his election as supreme leader of the WPK. "He has wisely led the WPK over 30 odd years, true to the idea and intention of President Kim Il Sung," he noted.
   He said "comrade Kim Jong Il is successfully realizing the cause of the Korean revolution and the cause of national reunification started by President Kim Il Sung."
   He hoped that the WPK and the Korean people would achieve successes in their efforts for the prosperity and development of the country and the reunification under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   A message of greetings to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: KNCP statement
articles.content:
Representative of UNDP gives party
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Representative of the UNDP to Korea Christian Lemaire gave a party on Friday, Day of the United Nations.
   Invited to the party were Vice-Minister Choe Su Hon of Foreign Affairs and officials concerned together with foreign diplomats in Pyongyang.
   Present there were also interim acting representatives of the World Food Program and  United Nations Children's Fund to the DPRK.
   Speeches were made at the party.

articles.title: Banquet given by Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
KNCP statement
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean National Peace Committee (KNCP) issued a statement Friday condemning the south Korean rulers for more frantically hurrying towards the completion of preparations for a war against the north.
   The statement says that the Kim Young Sam group worked out a detailed operation plan for a preemptive attack on the northern half of the country and is hell-bent on extensive arms buildup.
   They announced they would stage "Foal Eagle" joint military exercises with the United States from Oct. 27 to Nov. 8,to perfect the attack operation against the north in all aspects, it notes, and goes on:
   The facts clearly show that the danger of war on the lips of the south Korean authorities does not come from the north of Korea, but from the south.
   The Kim Young Sam group, who have been forsaken by the nation for their anti-national, anti-social evil policies, are now in an uncontrollable unrest with "Presidential Elections" approaching, and their scheme for "resumption of office" is becoming impossible.
   They are seeking a way out of the worst crisis by aggravating the situation and more desperately staging war games against the north to this end.

articles.title: Meetings to celebrate Kim Jong Il's election in different countries
articles.content:
Banquet given by Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) gave a banquet in Tokyo on Oct. 23 to congratulate Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Present were Chairman Han Tok Su of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, officials of Chongryon and Korean traders and industrialists in Japan.
   Members of the Houses of Representatives and councilors and public figures of Japan and diplomatic envoys were present.
   Chief Vice-Chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee Ho Jong Man in his speech said that the Koreans in Japan are overwhelming with great emotion and joy of greeting a new historic era when General Kim Jong Il was elected General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and are firmly convinced of future. The Korean people will certainly achieve new national prosperity and national reunification in the glorious Kim Jong Il's era, he stressed.

articles.title: Rally and demonstration in south Korea
articles.content:
Meetings to celebrate Kim Jong Il's election in different countries
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held to celebrate Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at a hall of panoramic pictures of Syria, the People's Palace of Guinea, Antananarivo, the National Youth Council of Uganda, Vienna, the Guinean garrison, Nakhon Pathom City of Thailand, the Youth Independent Revolutionary Front of Mali, the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, the Lagos University of Industry of Nigeria, the Kilembe branch of the Uganda-DPRK Friendship Association, Milano, the Teachers' Hall of Peru, the Juche Idea Study Society of Delhi, India, the Zimbabwean Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, and the Zimbabwean Youth Centre for the Study of Kim Il Sungism.
   Mustafa Tlass, Minister of Defence of Syria, in his speech said " the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Party was their long-standing hope."
   The First Vice Speaker of the Guinean Parliament in his speech said "the Korean people are highly praising comrade Kim Jong Il as the great leader and vigorously struggling for the socialist construction and peaceful reunification of the country under his leadership."
   A celebration meeting of the Arab and friendly political parties and national liberation movement forces was held in Damascus on Oct. 11.
   Present at the meeting were representatives from 19 political parties and organizations including the Communist Party of Syria (Bagdash), the Communist Party of Syria (Yussef), the Palestinian National Liberation Movement, the Iraqi Communist Party and the Jordanian Communist Party.
   Speakers at the meeting sincerely hoped that the friendly Korean people would achieve greater success in the socialist construction and the work for national reunification rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: CPV's entry into Korean War marked
articles.content:
Rally and demonstration in south Korea
  Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- More than 8,000 members of the "Korean Confederation of Trade Unions" held a rally at the Jongmyo Park in Seoul on October 24 in protest against the puppet authorities' disposal of the Kia business group which is now in the crisis of bankruptcy, according to a radio report from Seoul.
   They accused the government of neglecting the bankruptcy of the Kia business group and driving the economy into confusion before handing over the Kia Motor Co., Ltd. to a specific businessman.
   They branded the authorities' decision concerning court receivership toward the Kia business group as a plot of political-economic collusion and declared that in case the Authorities do not withdraw it forthwith, they will stage a general strike throughout the country.
    The unionists of the Kia Motor Co., Ltd. and Daegyong- Hwasong Co., Ltd. in Ansan of Kyonggi Province joined the strike of the unionists of the Kia Motor Co., Ltd. and the Asia Motor Co., Ltd. on Oct. 24.
   The unionists of the Kia Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. and the Kia Electricity Co., Ltd. in Changwon of South Kyongsang Province held general meetings and decided to enter an all-out strike from Oct. 27.

articles.title: Kim Young Sam group's preparations for war against the north condemned
articles.content:
CPV's entry into Korean War marked
 Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today dedicates an article to the 47th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese people's volunteers into the Korean War.
   The daily says that the officers and men of the CPV who participated in the Korean War performed undying feats, which will shine in history, in the three-year heroic struggle, sharing life and death with the officers and men of the Korean People's Army. The might of the Korea-China friendship was powerfully demonstrated through the entry of the CPV into the Korean War.
   It goes on:
   The Korea-China friendship is a traditional friendship that has long historic roots and overcame all trials.
   The friendship is now developing in conformity with the aspirations and desire of the peoples of the two countries.
   The leaders of Korea and china have deep interest in the work for constantly developing generation after generation the Korea-china friendship, which was provided and cultivated by the preceding leaders. The friendly relations between the peoples of Korea and China are playing a beneficial role in defending the common cause of socialism and independence against imperialism and advancing the revolution and construction in the two countries.
   The Chinese people are now making active efforts to achieve the stability and unity of the whole country and build a modernized socialist power with the Chinese characteristics under the correct leadership of the Communist Party of China headed by President Jiang Zemin.
   The Korean people are sincerely rejoiced over the achievements made by the Chinese people in the revolution and construction as over their own.
   They wish the Chinese people greater success in the work to achieve the prosperity and development of the People's Republic of China and implement the decisions of the 15th National Congress of the CPC.

articles.title: U.S. government delegation here
articles.content:
Kim Young Sam group's preparations for war against the north condemned
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Newspapers here today carry commentaries denouncing the south Korean puppets for their more frantic preparations for a war against the north.
   The Kim Young Sam group is persistently inciting anti-DPRK confrontation, staging war exercises almost every day.
   Meanwhile, the puppet warmongers have planned to purchase war equipment worth about 90 million dollars from the United States and announced they would stage large-scale military exercises, codenamed "Foal Eagle", with the U.S. from Oct. 27 to Nov. 8.
   The news analyst of Rodong Sinmun says:
   When the whole nation are burning their hearts with the desire for peace and peaceful reunification of the country, the Kim Young Sam group are running amuck to unleash a war against the north. They are a group of unparalleled traitors and dastardly war hawks who should be kept alive no longer within the nation.
   We are in full readiness both for peace and war.
   If the south Korean puppets persistently provoke us in league with outsiders, they will suffer a bitterer defeat than that in the past Fatherland Liberation War.
   Minju Joson says that the Kim Young Sam group should immediately stop the dangerous war gambles, a grave consequence of which may annihilate the nation and plunge humankind into a misfortune.

articles.title: Sudanese military delegation here
articles.content:
U.S. government delegation here

   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A government delegation of the United States of America headed by Len Rogers, Acting Assistant Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development, arrived here today.
